price: I obraduj vjernike time da će u Allaha veliku blagodat imati,
arabic: وَبَشِّرِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ بِأَنَّ لَهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ فَضۡلٗا كَبِيرٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wabashiri al-mu'minīna bi-anna lahum mina al-lahi faḍlan kabīran
